author: tgraves
msg: MAPREDUCE-4197. Include the hsqldb jar in the hadoop-mapreduce tar file (Ravi Prakash via tgraves)

author: gokturk
msg: * All core schema elements are reverted to non-IPojo mode. loader is still able to be extended in OSGI through IPojo schema elements. However keeping these elements out of IPojo management gave server a significant speed increase at startup

author: sallen
msg: Added utility methods to convert iterators of Triples to Statements and vice-versa.

author: gokturk
msg: * Added static imports to core schema elements of ApacheDS, thus resulting in loader to classload them and have significant performance gain
